categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi

nodes.text: Star Wars: BB-8 Deluxe Book and 3D Wood Model
Star Wars: IncrediBuilds BB-8 is an activity book that was released as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi.
Build your own BB-8 with this IncrediBuilds: Star Wars model kit, featuring a full-color book with facts and trivia on everyone's favorite new droid!
Build and color your own 3D BB-8 model and learn all about this fan favorite Star Wars character in this deluxe IncrediBuildsTM book set.

Lovable astromech droid BB-8 takes center stage in this exciting Star Wars wood model set. The deluxe 32-page hardcover book is packed with information on BB-8—from his basic capabilities to his pivotal role in the Resistance—and is filled with stunning imagery and behind-the-scenes content from the Star Wars universe. The wood model is easy to assemble and snaps together to form a dynamic, displayable 3D version of BB-8 that fans will love.
